result.title: Invesco Mortgage Capital: A REIT Stuck In A Holding Pattern, Despite Fed Decision
result.text: Invesco Mortgage Capital (IVR) gets rated hold for my initial coverage of this stock. Upside could come from lower Fed rates and demand spark for mortgages, as well as a continued trend of strong profit margins. This REIT's portfolio has declined in value but also shrunk due to selling assets, while it also has struggled to grow operating cashflow and dividends.
